interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LumaRx Facial Cleansing Brush with 1-Minute Pulsing Timer and LED Speed Indicator Light, Rechargeable and Showerproof, White/Silver
Review Date: 2016/03/03
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Material': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'LumaRx', 'Color': 'White/Silver', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '074590543216', 'Manufacturer': 'LumaRx'}
Review Text: I'm pretty happy about the LumaRx facial cleansing brush. It is designed very ergonomically and is very comfortable to hold during use. The tool is extremely lightweight and has a tapered design which makes it so comfortable to use. The instructions are to use it for a minute each morning and evening. It has illustrations which show you to spend 20 seconds on the right side and 20 seconds on the left side and 20 seconds on the T-zone. The tool will actually buzz gently when you should move to the next area. This is a great feature! It also comes with 3 brush heads; massage, sensitive and normal skin. I am using the sensitive for now and it is perfect for a gentle exfoliation. When I am finished with that minute, my skin just glows and feels so clean! Hopefully the heads do not need replaced quickly as I do not think they are yet available on Amazon or online. It also comes with a sleek charger that does not take up any room at all on the counter – this is important to me as I have a small bathroom. Also, the LumaRx comes with a very nice carrying case that will come in handy for an upcoming vacation.
Review Title: Exciting product for smooth and glowing skin
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
### User Profile Summary

**General Preferences:**
- Values ergonomics and comfort in product design.
- Prioritizes lightweight and space-saving features, particularly in small living spaces.
- Appreciates products with clear, user-friendly instructions and intuitive functionality.

**Product Focus:**
- Interest in facial cleansing tools, particularly those that enhance skincare routines.
- Preference for gentle exfoliation suited for sensitive skin.
- Looks for products with multiple functionality (e.g., different brush heads).

**Desired Outcomes:**
- Goals include achieving smooth, glowing skin and maintaining cleanliness.
- Enjoys features that promote routine adherence (e.g., built-in timers).

**Shopping Considerations:**
- Product sustainability and availability of replacement parts are important.
- Interest in accessories that enhance product usability, such as carrying cases.

**Future Intents:**
- Likely to consider travel-friendly beauty tools.
- May seek out other devices that prioritize skin health and convenience, with a focus on lightweight and ergonomic design.
